summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Renaildes Cakes e-commerce application. Backend APIs working excellently (85.7% success rate). Frontend UI and most workflows functional. Identified cart persistence issue that needs fixing.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: Cart items don't persist between page reloads/sessions
ui_bugs.symptoms: Items added to cart disappear when navigating directly to checkout or refreshing page

ui_bugs.issue: No cart item count indicator visible
ui_bugs.symptoms: Users can't see how many items are in cart

integration_issues.issue: Cart state not maintained when navigating directly to checkout URL
integration_issues.symptoms: Checkout shows empty cart even when items were added

passed_tests: All 13 products loaded and displayed correctly
Category filtering (4 round cakes, 3 rectangular, 5 sweets, 1 kit)
Product detail pages with quantity controls
Add to cart functionality within same session
Admin dashboard with products and orders display
Checkout form validation and payment method selection
Homepage hero section and featured products
Responsive design with proper color scheme (pink, brown, cream)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix cart persistence issue in CartContext - items should persist between page reloads and direct navigation to checkout. Add cart item count indicator to navbar cart icon. The cart localStorage is working but the React context is not properly hydrating from localStorage on page load.
